title: feeling sound
author: feeling sound
content: Hello, Dear Can anyone tell me which token should I use for my investment which will give me profit in a short time as I am investing for the first time?Thank You,

comments.author: koang
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 29, 2022, 04:56:09 AMHello, Dear Can anyone tell me which token should I use for my investment which will give me profit in a short time as I am investing for the first time?Thank You, If someone gives the advice to buy a coin and promises a profit in a short time, you can be sure it is a fraud.There are plenty of 'sharks' out there waiting to take your money.The most important thing for a novice investor to do before buying a coin is to do researchstudying the asset well, its function, purpose, technology, and the team behind it.Avoid coins that made promises but haven't delivered anything yet

comments.author: crypto-project
comments.body: You need to know that investing in cryptocurrencies is not sure to be profitable. Sometimes you will experience a loss or profit and that is also uncertain, it can be achieved in a short time or in the long term. So when you ask this question to the forum it is funny, because even if there is a coin that gives profit in a short time it is usually a scam coin and if you want to invest in a scam coin, please ask another forum.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 29, 2022, 04:56:09 AMCan anyone tell me which token should I use for my investment which will give me profit in a short time as I am investing for the first time?Theres so many fishes therr and no one wanted to lose on a lousy decision. Theres also many recommendation of tokens that can give profit but for me its a risky choice. If you want to earn something without incurred much losses then choose stablecoin, there are some platform which can stake those and earn a stable profit. Not much but its not that risky compared to trading. When it comes to trading my personal preferences are those rising L1 projects that can stand and compete with eth.  Feel free to choose those.

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 29, 2022, 04:56:09 AMHello, Dear Can anyone tell me which token should I use for my investment which will give me profit in a short time as I am investing for the first time?Thank You, Shorter time = higher risk of losing your money.You're investing for the first time and yet you are asking for an investment which will give you profit in a short amount of time. I see this is as a wrong move knowing that you're just starting.Be patient OP. Investing in crypto and getting profit will take time. Most of the investors who are asking short term profits are losing their money in the end. Yes there are some who are gaining profits for a shorter time but that is a huge gamble for them and they might lose their money if things doesn't go their way. If you're mindset is short term profits, you will make wrong decisions that might affect your journey as an investor as you might lose money more often. Try to research, watch, learn first and then invest if you have knowledge.Anyway to answer you OP, you want to invest into a token that will give you profit in a shorter amount of time? Invest into coins that has low market cap as they are more prone to pump and dump. Like I said, shorter time = higher risk and there is a high chance that you might get scammed and lose all of your capital in one wrong decision.

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 29, 2022, 04:56:09 AMCan anyone tell me which token should I use for my investment which will give me profit in a short time as I am investing for the first time?Any legit token in the market as long as when it was in the bearish trend. If you are having intention to invest in the token and you shall not expect to get instant profit from there. You must also aware that if the fact that earning profit from doing investment in the crypto was not easy. It's better if you stick with top coins in the market. Remember bitcoin can get correction anytime. It seems like crypto is starting to get a big traction again after months of bearish trend. Try to hodl yourself to invest when crypto market was on the bullish trend.

comments.author: tbct_mt2
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 29, 2022, 04:56:09 AMCan anyone tell me which token should I use for my investment which will give me profit in a short time as I am investing for the first time? Don't invest if you are not affordable for loss.Be aware of risk of your investment. About investment risk, tokens have more risks than coins. Because tokens don't have their own blockchains. All transactions are on a blockchain they did not own. So the price of that token will rely on their products and that chain. They can control their products but they can not control that chain.About risk of coins, Bitcoin has less risk, altcoins have more risks.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Be careful of unusual tokens that will be shilled to you. Because if someone asks you for tokens to invest with, you can be shilled with random shitcoins that you will take unknowingly.Whether you are for short term or not, bitcoin is the best choice and you can also make profit from it.For top altcoins, ETH is the ideal choice for most.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: If it's that easy we won't see many people in this forum anymore. We are too busy spending all those money to give you our opinions. Do not take the shortcut, it doesn't have a good ending. Most of the time. Short term, go for trading. That may be the best-suited application if you want profits in a short manner of time. But do it at your own risk. Trade stablecoins over altcoins that have high volatility. BNB, Ethereum. Both those coins have a lot of activity this past few weeks.

comments.author: CryptoYar
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 29, 2022, 04:56:09 AMHello, Dear Can anyone tell me which token should I use for my investment which will give me profit in a short time as I am investing for the first time?No one knows what coin or token can give you profit in the short term as no one knows what will be bitcoins next move.Because every token or coin follows bitcoin. If bitcoin goes up, all other cryptocurrencies go up too. Vice-versa.So it is better to invest with long-term plan and wait for the next 2-3 years as it is expected that bitcoin hit its all-time high after halving and your token will also touch new heights if it is a good project.

comments.author: inanilujimi
comments.body: Look for tokens that already have such uses and are listed on a popular exchange like binance. it's hard to get profit in a short time unless you can see the future, there are tokens in 5 days can reach x 10 if you can find them, one example might be the Wing on binance.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 29, 2022, 04:56:09 AMCan anyone tell me which token should I use for my investment which will give me profit in a short time as I am investing for the first time?You are asking the wrong thing here, nothing is certain in the crypto space, anything is possible. You can buy any token today and get even 1000% profit tomorrow, and vice versa. I don't think the people on this forum can help you with the questions you ask.Maybe you can change your question to make more sense, like:1. Which tokens have the potential to go up in the current metaverse or Web 3.0 hype?2. As a beginner, which token or coin is good for me? with low or high volatility?

comments.author: TribalBob
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 29, 2022, 04:56:09 AMHello, Dear Can anyone tell me which token should I use for my investment which will give me profit in a short time as I am investing for the first time?Thank You, if you expect a short profit I think you are wrong in investing, you can sell real products not in crypto, because basically dicrypto takes time and a process to get maximum profits, anyways we can only suggest which tokens are good and worth it for only invested and not to be applied as a giver of short profits

comments.author: virasisog
comments.body: If you're a beginner, you should know all the risks of crypto investment first. There's no guarantee that you could get the profit that you want. However, you have to choose good coins with huge potential just like Bitcoin and Ethereum and honestly, it's the best time to buy any of them right now since the price is still low. Just do the continuous process of learning so you'll have an idea of how you will deal with the volatility of these coins.

comments.author: Mame89
comments.body: Quote from: ilovealtcoins on July 29, 2022, 01:40:08 PMQuote from: feeling sound on July 29, 2022, 04:56:09 AMHello, Dear Can anyone tell me which token should I use for my investment which will give me profit in a short time as I am investing for the first time?Thank You, If you want to make money quickly especially in a short time, I would suggest you to search for meme coin or shitcoins, we make you profit in short time but you can also lose everything if you invest wrongly coin. the probability of losing is 99%, only 1% win if you are lucky enough. Cryptocurrency is not an easy place to make money in a short time, you should give up that mindset if you want to make money in this market.not necessarily generate coin memes now what else is going on bear season, beginners like this should know the basics of the material don't think about quick profits. shitcoin coin is not very good for now most of the founders just walk away with people's money. which is certainly my advice is better to wait for bitcoin to bottom price 10k-12k and buy BNB,ETH,BTC which I think this will be good for long-term investment, and minimal risk

comments.author: CuriousGeorge
comments.body: if it's your first time investing, you better stick with the famous alts like bnb and eth if you want short term investment, mainly because the more famous coin hardly scam you and investing in newer alts usually could result in massive loss.the thing with your question is like you're asking the future, if there's sure way of knowing that these certain alts gonna score high return of investment in the future then we'd all likely become billionaires, that isn't the case though.

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 29, 2022, 04:56:09 AMCan anyone tell me which token should I use for my investment which will give me profit in a short time as I am investing for the first time?Make a profits in a short time is not an investment but a trade, you also have to have experience or understand to do it, indeed we can invest in short terms but it is not easy because it depends on the trend or hype, but you also have to wait maybe a month or more to gain profit. Investment in tokens is also not that great, you better think about investing in the more popular Altcoins.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Bitcoin? Investing in the altcoins was not a money machine to give you instant money. Im sure that if you will need the time to make sure if your investment can give you profit. You can try to check top 100 - 200 CMC. You must also understand that if using altcoin as money generator was a big mistake. Think about earning from your investment. That means you shall pick the correct token at the right time. I meant if you must also think about the risk.

comments.author: smartaction
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 29, 2022, 04:56:09 AMCan anyone tell me which token should I use for my investment which will give me profit in a short time as I am investing for the first time?Thank You, It should be bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, Matic, Solana, etc. These coin is must trusted and valuable. you should invest your money on these. In this case, you will have less chance of major losses.  And if you hold them for long-term you will be able to get a huge profit. another tokens/coins can give you more big profit in less time then these coins. but it has more risk to chance of major losses

comments.author: juanda
comments.body: Quote from: feeling sound on July 29, 2022, 04:56:09 AMHello, Dear Can anyone tell me which token should I use for my investment which will give me profit in a short time as I am investing for the first time?Thank You, I think it's better for you to find information about the altcoins that you want to invest independently because there are so many potential altcoins that can give you profit. but cryptocurrencies are very difficult to guess where the graph will move in a short time. but my advice please take a look at coinmarketcap because there are so many altcoins that you can choose for you to invest your money in. and my advice is to choose an altcoin that is trending and is in the top 1 to 50.
